techmeme.title: Trump Media says it is beta testing Truth Search AI, a new search feature powered by Perplexity, on the web version of Truth Social (Matthew Gault/404 Media)
Duolingo reports Q2 revenue up 41% YoY to $252.3M, above $240.7M est., raises FY 2025 revenue forecast to $1.01B-$1.02B, above est.; DUOL jumps 14%+ after hours (Akash Sriram/Reuters)
President Trump says he will impose a "tariff of approximately 100% on chips and semiconductors", exempting firms like Apple that "committed to build" in the US (Bloomberg)
Apple commits $2.5B to produce all iPhone and Apple Watch cover glass at Corning's Kentucky facility, part of its plan to invest $600B in the US over four years (Apple)
Lyft reports Q2 revenue up 11% YoY to $1.59B vs. $1.61B est., gross bookings up 12% to $4.5B, rides up 14% to 234.8M vs. 235.9M est.; LYFT drops 6%+ after hours (Akash Sriram/Reuters)
